column4: I'm getting an error when logging into GNOME on Edgy: something about a message bus error
anyone know what could be causing a message bus error when logging into GNOME on edgy?
im attempting to make it show up, sometimes i see a gray box instead of the error box, but i remember something about failing to map a message bus address
I've not got a clue what's going on :) - probs won't know the answer either. Would be best to know what you're doing

I've just installed Ubuntu Edgy on another laptop. It ran fine with LiveCD, but when I login through the installed one all I see is the background image. When logging in Failsafe Gnome, I get a gray box which sometimes fully renders with the error message

It logged into GNOME and I can see the panels now, and I got the error, which says that themes/sounds/etc might not work properly (and they don't) because it could not find the address of the message bus
That's what was generating the error. It outputs some dbus related errors and crashes
not sure why the daemon won't start :(
Well do you think I should reinstall?
Reinstalling the dbus package fixed it. I suspect a bad CD
